title: Can i get a refund on a Champion?
body: So I'm been browsing through the purchase store and saw twitch, i was trying to preview him but accidentally bought him. Is it possible i can get a refund I've used all my refund. May i please get one.

replies.body:
Thats the biggest flaw with the new store design, previewing is secondary (tiny little hitbox) while buying a champion is the priority (easily 90% of the hitbox)

It's a very inconvenient design flaw :/
If you've already used your refund tokens, there isn't anything I'm able to do unfortunately :(  Each account is only given 3 refund tokens per lifetime.
